> **Example tag bundle**
> - `activity` – Students manipulate materials or data directly.
> - `lab` – Structured investigations with measurable outcomes.

> `courseCode` must match an entry in `src/content/courses`, and lesson tags may include any of:
> `activity`, `demonstration`, `reading`, `lab`, `assessment`.

## Learning Goals
Spell out the knowledge, skills, or dispositions students should demonstrate.

## Preparation
List readings, equipment, and safety notes that must be handled before class.

## Facilitation Steps
1. Hook the group with an image, anecdote, or question.
2. Run the core activity with timings and transitions.
3. Close with reflection prompts or formative checks.

## Assessment
Share rubrics, discussion questions, or exit tickets tied to the goals.
